roleset.name: pledge, designate to

example.name: Arg 0 is only for Causing a committment
example.text: Our team is committed to minimizing or preventing chemotherapy toxicity.
example.arg: to minimizing or preventing chemotherapy toxicity.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to commit.01. Commit.01 is a member of VN classes dedicate-79 and confine-92.1. Framed by Katie.
